channel.title: How would i add "M" When trying to withdraw "X Amount of money"
channel.description:
Im trying to add the option 10m for example when you are trying to withdraw money instead of typing all those zero's.
Is there maybe a guide to do this?
EDIT: SORRY I POSTED IN THE WRONG SECTION, IF YOU WOULD MOVE TO THE HELP SECTION PLEASE.
